name: Procedural climber prototype
description:
A simple prototype to test procedural animation on a character with any number of feet and some climbing mechanics.

---

CONTROLS :

ZQSD or Arrows : turn the camera / move forward or backward.
Spacebar : Jump
Left shift : hold to run
Left Cmd : hold for slow walk.
Alt (gauche) : hold for biped walk.
R : restart
Escape : quit the game
